widgets.onCreate:
var stype = getProp('parent', 'variables').stripType

locals.ids = [
  stype + "_eq_freq_low", stype + "_eq_gain_low",
  stype + "_eq_freq_middle", stype + "_eq_gain_middle",
  stype + "_eq_freq_high", stype + "_eq_gain_high"
]

widgets.label: RØ

Selected channel: return level from ALSA / JACK

widgets.onValue:
var lpfId = get('reverb_type') === 14 ? 'reverb_damp' : 'reverb_lpf'
set('reverb_hpf', value[0])
set(lpfId, value[2])
set('reverb_range', [value[0],value[2]])

  F3: 'metering',
